game.name: Backrooms Protocol
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Backrooms Protocol is a 1–4 player co-op horror game focused on exploration, research, and survival across the levels of the Backrooms.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Backrooms Protocol is a 1–4 player co-op horror game focused on exploration, research, and survival across the levels of the Backrooms.
